Events

Documentation of all events conducted by MEMS D-AMP - resume sessions, workshops, and information sessions

Resume Building Workshop

Session 1

Resume
October 15, 2024
Duration: 2 hours
Attendees: 45 students

Event Summary

Comprehensive workshop on resume building for internship applications. Covered ATS optimization, formatting best practices, and content organization.

Key Takeaways

  • • Use action verbs and quantifiable achievements
  • • Keep resume to 1 page for internships
  • • Tailor resume for each application
  • • Include relevant projects and skills

Resources

📄 Resume Template 📊 Sample Resumes 🎥 Recording

SOPHIE 101 Workshop

Statement of Purpose

SOPHIE
November 5, 2024
Duration: 3 hours
Attendees: 32 students

Event Summary

In-depth workshop on writing effective Statements of Purpose for higher studies applications. Covered structure, content, and common mistakes.

Key Takeaways

  • • Start with a compelling hook
  • • Show research alignment
  • • Include specific examples
  • • Keep it concise and focused

Resources

📝 SOP Template 📖 Sample SOPs 🎥 Recording

Dual Degree Session

Information & Guidance

Dual Degree
September 20, 2024
Duration: 2.5 hours
Attendees: 28 students

Event Summary

Comprehensive session on dual degree programs at IIT Bombay. Covered application process, requirements, and career implications.

Key Takeaways

  • • Apply in 2nd year
  • • Minimum CPI requirement varies
  • • Additional 1-2 years of study
  • • Enhanced career opportunities

Resources

📋 Application Guide 📊 Program Details 🎥 Recording

Technical Interview Prep

Coding & Problem Solving

Workshop
October 25, 2024
Duration: 4 hours
Attendees: 38 students

Event Summary

Intensive workshop on technical interview preparation. Covered data structures, algorithms, and problem-solving strategies.

Key Takeaways

  • • Practice on platforms like LeetCode
  • • Focus on time complexity
  • • Communicate your approach
  • • Practice mock interviews

Resources

📚 Study Guide 💻 Practice Problems 🎥 Recording

Alumni Interaction

Career Guidance

Workshop
November 12, 2024
Duration: 3 hours
Attendees: 52 students

Event Summary

Interactive session with MEMS alumni working in various industries. Shared career experiences and industry insights.

Key Takeaways

  • • Network with alumni
  • • Industry trends and opportunities
  • • Career path guidance
  • • Internship and job referrals

Research Symposium

Student Presentations

Workshop
December 8, 2024
Duration: 6 hours
Attendees: 65 students

Event Summary

Annual research symposium showcasing student projects and research work. Featured presentations from 4th year students and faculty talks.

Key Takeaways

  • • Research presentation skills
  • • Current research trends
  • • Collaboration opportunities
  • • Publication guidance
